3. City Council

City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* 6:00 p.m.
* The 1st and 3rd Monday of each month (see calendar for holiday schedule)
* Located in the City Council Chambers at 110 E 3rd Street, Arlington

Workshops
---------

* 6:00 p.m.
* The 2nd and 4th Monday of each month (see calendar for holiday schedule)
* Located in the City Council Chambers at 110 E 3rd Street, Arlington

No action will be taken at workshops.  
The public is encouraged to attend meetings.    
Meetings are streamed live on YouTube at [City of Arlington WA - YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/CityofArlingtonWashington)

### [Contact Us](https://arlingtonwa.gov/Directory.aspx)

1. #### City Council

   [Email the City Council](mailto:coa_council@arlingtonwa.gov)

Agendas
-------

To obtain a current Council meeting agenda, meeting minutes or the full packet you can click on the [event calendar](https://arlingtonwa.gov/calendar.aspx?CID=22) for the date of the council meeting or [email the Executive office](mailto:executive@arlingtonwa.gov) or call at 360-403-3441. City Council minutes from 1903 to 2009 are available on the [State Archive website](http://www.digitalarchives.wa.gov/Collections/TitleInfo/1202).

Note that the packet for the upcoming council meeting is available typically the Thursday afternoon prior to the meeting. The agenda packet shown is the most current available and may be for the meeting that just occurred.

**Public Comment**  
When not attending the meeting in person, you may provide written or oral public comment. To provide oral comment through Microsoft Teams, you must pre-register to speak by 9:00 a.m. the day of the meeting, by filling out [this form](https://forms.arlingtonwa.gov/Forms/CouncilComment) or by calling 360-403-3441. Prior to the meeting, directions will be emailed to you by 6:00 p.m. the day of the meeting. If you have any questions, please contact the Administration Department at 360-403-3441 or [administration@arlingtonwa.gov](mailto:administration@arlingtonwa.gov?subject=Public%20Comment%20Sign%20In).  
   
If you would like to submit written public comment only, you may do so in the written comment section in [the form](https://forms.arlingtonwa.gov/Forms/CouncilComment). Written comment must be submitted by 9:00 a.m. the Monday of the meeting.

Both written and oral public comment will be documented as public comment.

### Mayor: [Don Vanney](https://www.arlingtonwa.gov/415/Don-Vanney)
